did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Company based in New York City, N.Y. Collection comprises an incomplete contract featuring penciled-in details regarding New York City outdoor advertising locations or "bulletins," the size of the space, and the cost of advertising there.
